aircraft.value: Chimera Multi - AC-9768-533 at Zone-2 Facility

defect_observed.value: Paint coating disbondment. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Access Panels component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage

preventive_action.value: Modify design to incorporate additional safety margin

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 30/10/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 31/10/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 03/11/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 03/11/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 06/11/2023 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma
